amendment.description: Amendment, as modified, allows grant funds authorized in the bill to be used for the purpose of enhancing supply-chain security at truck inspection stations in or near high volume seaports in coordination with States and local governments.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 11 printed in House Report 109-450, as modified, adds to the list of eligible uses of grant funds in order to enhance supply chain security at truck inspection stations in or near high volume seaports in coordination with States and local governments.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Millender-McDonald amendment (A011) as modified Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Millender-McDonald amendment (A011) modified by unanimous consent.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A011) offered by Ms. Millender-McDonald.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Millender-McDonald amendment (A011) as modified Agreed to by voice vote.
